title: How do you Skip A Rank?

body: Apparently to skip a rank, you have to have the MMR of a rank above your current division. I had well over Gold1 MMR at Plat 4. Did they remove Rank Skipping or am I just dumb? Any answers would be appreciated.

replies.body: I am Gold 2 (promoted from G3.) I meant I had Plat 4 MMR.

Op.gg isnt a reliable source to see your mmr. I recently got to plat 5 and it said i "had" gold 2 elo hell mmr when i was like gaining 24-25 lp which means i have a slightly higher mmr than the average for the elo.. It depends how much you're getting, if you're getting anything above 27 then you're bound to skip.
The thing is tho, I wasn't playing against Gold 3's or Gold 4's. It was consistent Plat 5+ every game. Even in one game I had two Plat 2's.  I gained around roughly 25 per game

You dont have to be against 3s&4s its a whole range and considering your mmr its fine to vs people like that, ISH. Those plats must of had shitty mmr to be against you or the community doesnt have enough people around your mmr/lvl to compete.
ps: you're also gold 2 you're close to the plat tier so u should expect them
You can only skip the divisions between 2-4 and you have to be earning like 29+ LP a game, with a LOT of wins.
Well, if you're a Plat 4 with a Gold 1 MMR, then of course you wouldn't skip divisions.
